original_title: Funeral For A Friend ‎– Casually Dressed And Deep In Conversation: Live And In Full At Shepherds Bush Empire
overview: Funeral For A Friend's Live DVD from the Shepherds Bush Gig, where they presented their debut album "Casually Dressed And Deep In Conversation" in its entirety.
title: Funeral For A Friend ‎– Casually Dressed And Deep In Conversation: Live And In Full At Shepherds Bush Empire
